title: Wild mushroom soup with homemade garlic bread
description: Roasting the garlic adds a sweetness to garlic bread - perfect to serve with a simple creamy soup,
ingredients: 625g/1lb 6oz wild mushrooms, such as chanterelle, ceps, tompette, girolle or oyster
salt and freshly ground black pepper
¼ bunch fresh chervil, chopped, to garnish
